steps.name: When FireBase_the user receives the scan initiation response
Then FireBase_the status code returned should be 404 for not found error
And FireBase_the response should contain an error message "Not Found"

And FireBase_the message should contain "Provided Chatbot 70ebd370-38bb-43e5-9956-5c8cda370b1c not found in Environment aae0a1b6-fafe-40af-ab20-87934343521f.Both chatbot and environment should exist and chatbot should be assigned to the environment."
